Package by.grits.controllers

Class AdminController

java.lang.Object
by.grits.controllers.AdminController
public class AdminController extends Object
This is class controller which provides console input and output for user whose role type is ADMIN. User with such role has access to basic users' and items' information.

    • showItemInfo

      Method for displaying all information if the specific item.
      Parameters:
      item - desired item which information is wanted.

    • specificItemMenu

      private void specificItemMenu()
      Method to confirm if admin wants information of any specific item. Admin has to specify desired item's id in console input.

    • specificUserMenu

      private void specificUserMenu() throws DaoException
      Method to confirm if admin wants information of any specific user. Admin has to specify desired user's id in console input.
      Throws:
      DaoException - due to calling a service method with such exception
